resources.description:
The weighted estimate of the proportion of residents in each area taking a visit to the natural environment for health or exercise purposes over the previous seven days. 
https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/monitor-of-engagement-with-the-natural-environment-survey-purpose-and-results#results

There is no data for 2012 or 2013 because the sample sizes were too small
resources.name: Percentage of Herefordshire residents taking a visit to the natural environment for health or exercise purposes.

resources.description: Data in JSON format (useful for developers)
resources.name: Percentage of Herefordshire residents taking a visit to the natural environment for health or exercise purposes.

organization.description:
This is the community datastore for Herefordshire. [Here is a post about what the datastore is and why you should care](http://h-map.org.uk/2016/05/06/what-is-the-herefordshire-datastore-and-why-should/).


Part of the [Brightspace Foundation Route Map project](http://h-map.org.uk/).

We blog over at the [Route Map blog](http://h-map.org.uk/category/all-posts/).

If you'd like to add data here, you'll need a datahub.io account. Then [contact the RouteMap project](http://h-map.org.uk/contact-us/).
organization.title: Herefordshire
organization.name: hdata

name: utilisation-of-outdoor-space-for-exercise-health-reasons-in-herefordshire
notes: The weighted estimate of the proportion of residents in Herefordshire taking a visit to the natural environment for health or exercise purposes.
title: Utilisation of outdoor space for exercise/health reasons in Herefordshire
